name: part_010
file: tmp_【 3D LIVE 】Lapis Lazuli ⧸ 重大告知アリ！【 #鷹嶺ルイ重大告知LIVE 】 [PHrZ_dRSy_4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_010.mov

scenes.description: Takane Lui and Hoshimachi Suisei talk about Lui's new song "DARE!?" and its music video.
Takane Lui performs her new song "DARE!?".

subtitles.original: はい。あの...
subtitles.english: Yes. Well...

subtitles.original: 安田現象さんに作成をしていただいたフルアニメーションMVとなっております。
subtitles.english: It's a full-animation MV created by Gensho Yasuda.

subtitles.original: わあ、すごい。サムネもかわいい。
subtitles.english: Wow, amazing. The thumbnail is cute too.

subtitles.original: かわいいでしょ？
subtitles.english: It's cute, right?

subtitles.original: あっかんべーしてます。
subtitles.english: It's sticking its tongue out.

subtitles.original: あっかんべーしてるね。
subtitles.english: It is sticking its tongue out, isn't it?

subtitles.original: ということでこのね、誰というのは...
subtitles.english: So, this "DARE" refers to...

subtitles.original: 内面にいる、まあ私...
subtitles.english: An "another self" inside me...

subtitles.original: 私結構内面にアンチ持ってるんですけど。
subtitles.english: I actually have quite an "anti" inside me.

subtitles.original: お、そうなの。
subtitles.english: Oh, really?

subtitles.original: 鷹嶺ルイのアンチを持ってるんですけど。
subtitles.english: I have an "anti" of Takane Lui inside.

subtitles.original: 「お前本当にこれできんのか？」みたいなね。
subtitles.english: "Like, 'Can you really do this?'"

subtitles.original: 「お前本当にやれんのか？」みたいな。
subtitles.english: "Like, 'Are you really up for it?'"

subtitles.original: え、このなんか感情って誰なん？みたいな。
subtitles.english: Yeah, like, "Who is this feeling?"

subtitles.original: おお。
subtitles.english: Oh.

subtitles.original: え、私なん？私なの？なんで私、私を否定してるの？みたいな。
subtitles.english: Is it me? Me? Why am I denying myself?

subtitles.original: そういうね、誰っていう...
subtitles.english: That kind of "DARE"...

subtitles.original: 深い...
subtitles.english: Deep...

subtitles.original: そういう楽曲に仕上がっておりますし、
subtitles.english: It's that kind of song,

subtitles.original: それを Who are you DARE. 誰！
subtitles.english: And that... Who are you DARE. DARE!

subtitles.original: 誰！
subtitles.english: DARE!

subtitles.original: 誰なの？私なの？
subtitles.english: Is it DARE? Is it me?

subtitles.original: 誰なの！？
subtitles.english: Who is it!?

subtitles.original: という、え、曲になっておりますので、
subtitles.english: That's the kind of song it is,

subtitles.original: これからちょっとMVもね、プレミア公開させていただきますので。
subtitles.english: I'll be premiering the MV soon.

subtitles.original: ぜひぜひ、楽しんでいただければなと思いますし、
subtitles.english: I hope you'll enjoy it,

subtitles.original: 結構耳に残るサウンドになってますのでね。
subtitles.english: It's got a very catchy sound.

subtitles.original: ね、もう今、後ろでうっすら流れてますけど。
subtitles.english: Right, it's already playing faintly in the background.

subtitles.original: え、これは早くフル聴きたいし、
subtitles.english: Oh, I want to hear the full version soon,

subtitles.original: もうなんなら今から歌ってもらえませんか？
subtitles.english: And if possible, could you sing it now?

subtitles.original: え、え、なに？え？
subtitles.english: Wait, what?

subtitles.original: え、一緒に歌いますか？
subtitles.english: Wait, will you sing with me?

subtitles.original: え、あ、うーんと、じゃじゃじゃ、ヘイ、ヘイ...
subtitles.english: Oh, uh... well, well, hey, hey...

subtitles.original: ちょ、歌いなそうですね。
subtitles.english: Wait, it doesn't sound like you're going to sing.

subtitles.original: ということで、この後、実は誰を先行で歌わせていただきます！
subtitles.english: So, after this, I'll actually be performing "DARE" early!

subtitles.original: うわー！そうなの！？
subtitles.english: Wow! Really!?

subtitles.original: じゃあ私は端から見てますということで。
subtitles.english: Then I'll watch from the side.

subtitles.original: えー、待っててね。ご飯食べ、ご飯食べよう、一緒に。
subtitles.english: Wait for me. Let's eat together.

subtitles.original: あー、わかった。じゃあ舞台袖で見てますわ。
subtitles.english: Oh, okay. I'll watch from the wings then.

subtitles.original: この後、じゃあご飯ということで。よろしくお願いします。
subtitles.english: Then food after this. Looking forward to it.

subtitles.original: てか Who are you 誰。じゃ。
subtitles.english: Anyway, who are you, DARE. See ya.

subtitles.original: ありがとう。
subtitles.english: Thanks.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: すいちゃんでした！ありがとう、みんな！ありがとー。
subtitles.english: That was Sui-chan! Thanks everyone! Thank you.

subtitles.original: ありがとー。
subtitles.english: Thank you.

subtitles.original: ということで、心強かった助っ人、すいちゃんもいなくなり、
subtitles.english: So, with my reliable helper Sui-chan gone,

subtitles.original: 私一人でですね、新曲「Lapis Lazuli」にも入っております曲、
subtitles.english: Alone, I will perform a song included in my new single "Lapis Lazuli",

subtitles.original: 「DARE」を歌わせていただきます。
subtitles.english: The song "DARE".

subtitles.original: ちょっと水飲んでいいですか？水飲みますよ。水飲みます。
subtitles.english: Can I have some water? I'm going to drink some water. Drinking water.

subtitles.original: はい、ということで戻ってまいりました。
subtitles.english: Alright, I'm back.

subtitles.original: それでは皆さん、聴いてください。
subtitles.english: Now everyone, please listen.

subtitles.original: 「DARE」。
subtitles.english: "DARE".

subtitles.original: 誰だ　誰　そちら様　どちら様
subtitles.english: Who are you? Who? Who are you? Which one are you?

subtitles.original: 果てさて　Who are you? How are you? お元気で　一足お先に
subtitles.english: Well, well. Who are you? How are you? Take care, I'm going ahead.

subtitles.original: てか Who are you?
subtitles.english: Anyway, who are you?

subtitles.original: DARE!? / 作詞・作曲・編曲：てにをは
subtitles.english: DARE!? / Lyrics, Composition, Arrangement: teniwoha

subtitles.original: 昨日の自分が描いた縁かな　はみ出さないように
subtitles.english: Is it the edge my yesterday's self drew? So it doesn't stick out.

subtitles.original: 一回り小さな円を描くような
subtitles.english: Drawing a circle one size smaller.

subtitles.original: ボールのバウンドが少しずつ低くなる様を
subtitles.english: The way a ball's bounce gradually gets lower.

subtitles.original: 術もなく眺めているような気分でしょう？
subtitles.english: It feels like you're just watching it helplessly, doesn't it?

subtitles.original: ところで貴方
subtitles.english: By the way, you.

subtitles.original: 誰　誰　誰　誰！　誰　誰　誰　誰！
subtitles.english: Who, who, who, who! Who, who, who, who!

subtitles.original: おや　果てさて　存じ上げないわ　誰？
subtitles.english: Oh, well, well. I don't know you. Who?

subtitles.original: Who are you you you you? どちら様？ Face to face　こんにちは
subtitles.english: Who are you, you, you, you? Which one are you? Face to face, hello.

subtitles.original: You and me　混ざって　だって　Upside down　自分　自分
subtitles.english: You and me mixed up, because, upside down, self, self.

subtitles.original: Look-alike　だらけだ　ガラガラ　通せんせ　捕まえ　捕まえ　捕まえわ誰？
subtitles.english: Full of look-alikes, clattering, let me pass, catch, catch, who are you catching?

subtitles.original: 昨日の自分は自分の手で片付けましょう
subtitles.english: Let's clean up yesterday's self with our own hands.

subtitles.original: てか Who are you? 誰？
subtitles.english: Anyway, who are you? Who?

subtitles.original: 鏡の端から確か私を見張り続けてる
subtitles.english: From the edge of the mirror, I'm sure you're keeping a watch on me.

subtitles.original: なのでぐっと背筋伸ばし微笑むの
subtitles.english: So I straighten my back and smile.

subtitles.original: 花は誰に見られずとも美しく咲くと言うけど
subtitles.english: They say flowers bloom beautifully even if no one sees them,

subtitles.original: 盾や矛にもそっぽ向かれたら咲き方を改めるだろう
subtitles.english: But if even shields and spears turn away, they'd probably change how they bloom.

subtitles.original: DARE DARE DARE...
subtitles.english: DARE DARE DARE...

subtitles.original: 誰　誰　誰　存じ上げないわ　誰？
subtitles.english: Who, who, who. I don't know you. Who?

subtitles.original: Who are you you you you? どちら様？ Face to face　こんばんは
subtitles.english: Who are you, you, you, you? Which one are you? Face to face, good evening.

subtitles.original: You and me　混ざって　だって　Upside down　自分　自分
subtitles.english: You and me mixed up, because, upside down, self, self.

subtitles.original: Look-alike　だらけだ　ガラガラ　通せんせ　捕まえ...
subtitles.english: Full of look-alikes, clattering, let me pass, catch...
